se.lu.nateko.edca

Class ServerViewer

  • java.lang.Object
    • ListActivity
      • se.lu.nateko.edca.ServerViewer

  • public class ServerViewer
extends ListActivity

See the GNU General Public License * for more details. * * You should have received a copy of the GNU General Public License along * with EDCA. If not, see "http://www.gnu.org/licenses/". * * The latest source for this software can be accessed at * "github.org/mattiassp/edca". * * EDCA also utilizes the JTS Topology Suite, Version 1.8 by Vivid * Solutions Inc. It is released under the Lesser General Public License * ("http://www.gnu.org/licenses/") and its source can be accessed at the * JTS Topology Suite website ("http://www.vividsolutions.com/jts"). * * Android™ is a trademark of Google Inc. The Android source is released * under the Apache License 2.0 * ("http://www.apache.org/licenses/LICENSE-2.0") and can be accessed at * "http://source.android.com/". * * For other enquiries, e-mail to: edca.contact@gmail.com * * An activity class that lists ServerConnections and, through a Context * Menu, allows the user to: * - Launch the ServerEditor Activity in order to create new, edit or * connect to ServerConnections. * - Renew the connection to the most recently connected ServerConnection. * - Delete ServerConnections. * *
    Version:
    0.24, 2013-06-25 * *
    Author:
    Mattias Spångmyr *

      Defines the callback for Service binding, passed to bindService().

        public boolean setLayout_ActiveServer(ServerConnection srv)
        A method which will display the name of the currently active ServerConnection in green color.
        Parameters:

        Returns:
        Boolean showing true if successful, otherwise false.

        Makes a connection to the last used ServerConnection and retrieves the results of a getCapabilities request.
